alert.note: Alert for Iron; Reynolds (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 9:31AM CDT until July 17 at 10:15AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Iron County in southeastern Missouri... Northeastern Reynolds County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 1015 AM CDT. * At 931 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Oates, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Oates, Centerville, Sabula, Lesterville, Black, and Chloride. This also includes Johnsons Shut-Ins State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
